snippet: Planned Parenthood and the American Civil Liberties Union filed a lawsuit in federal court Tuesday to block a new law that would force three abortion clinics to shut.
abstract: Planned Parenthood and American Civil Liberties Union file lawsuit in federal court to block Alabama law that would force three of state's five abortion clinics to shut down; law would require doctors performing abortions to have admitting privileges at local hospitals.
lead_paragraph: Planned Parenthood and the American Civil Liberties Union filed a lawsuit in federal court Tuesday to block a new law that would force three abortion clinics to shut.

headline.seo: Alabama: Suit Is Filed to Block Abortion Clinic Law
headline.main: Alabama: Suit Is Filed to Block Abortion Clinic Law
headline.print_headline: Alabama: Suit Is Filed To Block Abortion Clinic Law
